attributes.action: Change the zebra crossing outside Royton library to a pelican crossing.
attributes.additional_details: This zebra crossing is in the very center of Royton and is used by MANY people a day including myself. And iv witnessed first hand how cars do not stop for this crossing.
attributes.background: Several days ago a young boy got hit at this very crossing causing severe injurie, this young boy needed surgery to correct these injuries and luckily survived his horrific accident. This young boy could of very easily been killed just like many others.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
